ssid.modes.modes(realization)#

Determine the modal parameters of a given state space system realization.

Parameters:

  • realization (tuple) – realization in the form of state space coefficients (A,B,C,D)

  • dt (float) – timestep

Returns:

natural frequencies, damping ratios, mode shapes, and eigenvalue condition numbers for each mode. stored as a dictionary in the freq, damp, modeshape, and cnd fields, respectively.

Return type:

dictionary
